original_text: But Deborah, Rebekah's nurse died, and she was buried beneath Bethel under an oak: and the name of it was called Allonbachuth.
korean_text: 리브가의 유모 드보라가 죽으매 그를 벧엘 아래에 있는 상수리나무 밑에 장사하고 그 나무 이름을 알론바굿이라 불렀더라

sentences.original_text: and she was buried beneath Bethel under an oak
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그녀는 벧엘 아래 상수리나무 아래에 묻혔으며

sentences.original_text: and the name of it was called Allonbachuth
